means: 影响的范围，管辖的范围
Rape Emergency Aid and Counseling for Her 强奸紧急援助和咨询服务
Retired Executives Action Clearinghouse 退休执行者行动会（英国自愿组织）

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"达到"之意。
means: attain ：侧重指在抱负或雄心的激励下，以最大的努力去达到一般所不及或不敢追求的目的。
reach ：常用词，指到达某一空间、时间、目标或发展过程中的某一点。
achieve ：侧重为达到目的所需的技巧、忍耐和努力。
arrive ：指得出结论，达成某项协议或作出某一决定等。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"到达"之意。
means: come ： 普通用词，含义广泛。强调到达的动作或进程，不侧重是否到达目的地。也可用于比喻意义。
arrive ： 侧重到达目的地或达到某一目标。也可用作比喻。
reach ： 既可指到达目的地，又可指到达途中的中间站。强调经过的周折或付出的努力。

sentence.Network_en: It was the uncommitted that Labour needed to reach.
sentence.Network_cn: 工党需要拉拢的是未表态者。

sentence.Network_en: I tried to reach the foot brakes but I couldn't.
sentence.Network_cn: 我试图去够脚刹，但是没能踩到。

sentence.Network_en: He recovered from a 4-2 deficit to reach the quarter-finals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在2比4落后的情况下实现逆转闯进1/4决赛。

jx.jx_en_mean: outside the distance to which someone can stretch out their hand
jx.jx_cn_mean: 超出某人双手的所及范围

jx.jx_en_mean: inside the distance to which someone can stretch out their hand
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在某人双手的所及范围之内；够得着

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English rǣcan, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch reiken and German reichen

entry.def: When someone or something reaches a place, they arrive there.

example.ex: He did not stop until he reached the door...
When the bus reached High Holborn, Tony rang the bell and they jumped off together...
example.tran: 当公交车到达海霍尔本站时，托尼摇响了铃，他们一起跳下了车。

entry.tran: 达到，到达（一定阶段、程度或数量）
entry.def: If someone or something has reached a certain stage, level, or amount, they are at that stage, level, or amount.

example.ex: The process of political change in South Africa has reached the stage where it is irreversible...
example.tran: 南非的政治变革已达到不可逆转的地步。

example.ex: The Belgian player Eduardo Masso has reached the final of the Dutch Open in Hilversum...
example.tran: 比利时选手爱德华多·马索进入了在希尔弗瑟姆举行的荷兰公开赛的决赛。

entry.def: If you reach somewhere, you move your arm and hand to take or touch something.

example.ex: Judy reached into her handbag and handed me a small printed leaflet...
example.tran: 朱蒂把手伸进提包，拿出一张小的印刷传单给我。

example.ex: I reached across the table and squeezed his hand...
example.tran: 我把手伸到桌子的另一边，捏住他的手。

entry.def: If you can reach something, you are able to touch it by stretching out your arm or leg.

example.ex: Can you reach your toes with your fingertips?
example.tran: 你能用手指尖碰到你的脚趾吗？

entry.def: If you try to reach someone, you try to contact them, usually by telephone.

example.ex: Has the doctor told you how to reach him or her in emergencies?...
example.tran: 医生有没有告诉你发生紧急情况时怎样与其取得联系？

example.ex: If I see her, I'll tell her you've been trying to reach her.
example.tran: 如果见到她，我会告诉她你一直在尝试联系她。

entry.def: If something reaches a place, point, or level, it extends as far as that place, point, or level.

example.ex: ...a nightshirt which reached to his knees...
The water level in Lake Taihu has reached record levels...
example.tran: 太湖水位达到了历史最高值。

entry.tran: 取得（一致意见）；达成（协议）；作出（决定）
entry.def: When people reach an agreement or a decision, they succeed in achieving it.

example.ex: A meeting of agriculture ministers in Luxembourg today has so far failed to reach agreement over farm subsidies...
example.tran: 今天参加卢森堡会议的各国农业部长目前尚未就农业补贴问题达成一致意见。

example.ex: They are meeting in Lusaka in an attempt to reach a compromise.
example.tran: 他们在卢萨卡举行会谈试图达成妥协。

entry.tran: 可达到的距离；所能及的限度
entry.def: Someone's or something's reach is the distance or limit to which they can stretch, extend, or travel.

example.ex: Isabelle placed a wine cup on the table within his reach.
example.tran: 伊莎贝尔把酒杯放在桌上他伸手可及的地方。

example.ex: ...a heavyweight who possesses a longer reach and more strength.
example.tran: 出拳更远且更有力量的重量级拳击手

entry.tran: （伸手）可及之距离;(可接受的)范围
entry.def: If a place or thing is within reach, it is possible to have it or get to it. If it is out of reach, it is not possible to have it or get to it.

example.ex: It is located within reach of many important Norman towns, including Bayeux...
example.tran: 它邻近许多重要的诺曼城镇，包括贝叶。

example.ex: The clothes they model for Littlewoods are all within easy reach of every woman...
example.tran: 他们为利特尔伍兹服装店展示的那些服装每个女人都穿得起。

means.word_mean: 1. the limits within which something can be effective;

sentences.sentence: "he was beyond the reach of their fire"

means.word_mean: 2. an area in which something acts or operates or has power or control: "the range of a supersonic jet";

sentences.sentence: "in the political orbit of a world power"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of physically reaching or thrusting out
1. reach a destination, either real or abstract;

sentences.sentence: "We barely made it to the finish line"
"I have to hit the MAC machine before the weekend starts"

means.word_mean: 2. reach a point in time, or a certain state or level;

sentences.sentence: "This car can reach a speed of 140 miles per hour"

means.word_mean: 3. move forward or upward in order to touch; also in a metaphorical sense;
4. be in or establish communication with;

sentences.sentence: "He never contacted his children after he emigrated to Australia"
"Can he reach?" "The chair must not touch the wall"

means.word_mean: 7. reach a goal, e.g., "make the first team";
8. place into the hands or custody of;

sentences.sentence: "Turn the files over to me, please"
"He turned over the prisoner to his lawyers"

means.word_mean: 9. to exert much effort or energy;

auth_sentence.content: He's clearly trying to extend his audience reach.
auth_sentence.res_content: He's clearly trying to extend his audience reach.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's clearly trying to extend his audience reach.

auth_sentence.content: Four years later, we reach the Beijing Games.
auth_sentence.res_content: Four years later, we reach the Beijing Games.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Four years later, we reach the Beijing Games.

auth_sentence.content: We believe we will reach an agreement very soon.
auth_sentence.res_content: We believe we will reach an agreement very soon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We believe we will reach an agreement very soon.

Sentence.sentence: However, we have already reached temperatures that are inlinewith other minimum-ice periods, so continued warming is likely not natural.
I can't seem to reach the tea at the back of the cupboard.
Use a ladder to help her reach the tea
Only the strongest can reach their destination to lay eggs.
The population increase in cities reached a new peak in Asia and Africa.
Perfectly eatable fruit and vegetable crops often fail to reach supermarkets due to their size or physical appearance.

sentences.en: They reached Paris by plane on March 8.
sentences.cn: 他们于三月八日乘坐飞机到达巴黎。

sentences.en: The news reached every part of the world.
She reached me a slice of bread.
One would need a long reach to be able to touch the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 必须把手伸得很长才能够到天花板。

sentences.en: We often divide a river into three parts, that is the upper, middle and lower reaches.
sentences.cn: 我们经常把一条河分成三部分:上游、中游和下游。

jushi.english: We can see nothing but houses as far as the eye can reach.
jushi.chinese: 在目光所及范围内,我们除了房屋别的什么也看不见。

jushi.english: After a long discussion they reached an understanding.
jushi.chinese: 经过长期讨论后,他们达成了谅解。
